org.wmn4j.analysis.harmony

Class PCProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wmn4j.analysis.harmony.PCProfile

  • public class PCProfile
extends Object
    Pitch class profile in twelve-tone equal-temperament (TET). Contains a bin for each pitch class, and each bin contains a non-negative value associated with the pitch class. By default the value of a note is 1.0 meaning that the pitch class profile is based on the counts of pitch classes. When creating the profile a PCProfile.Weighter can be given to calculate the value of a note differently.
    Author:
    Otso Bj√∂rklund

      • PCProfile

        public PCProfile(PCProfile.Weighter weighter)
        Constructor that allows specifying how the value of a note is computed when it is added to the profile.
        Parameters:
        weighter - used for computing the value of a note when the note is added to this profile.

    • Method Detail

      • getDurationWeightedProfile

        public static PCProfile getDurationWeightedProfile()
        Creates a PCProfile where the weight of a note's pitch class is weighted using the duration of the note.
        Returns:
        a PCProfile where pitch classes are weighted using note durations.

      • setValue

        public void setValue(PitchClass pc,
                     double value)
        Set a value for the PitchClass.
        Parameters:
        pc - the pitch class for the bin whose value is set.
        value - a non-negative value.

      • add

        public void add(Durational durational)
        Add the pitch class/classes of durational to this PCProfile. If durational is a Note add its pitch class bin. If durational is a Chord add pitch class bins of its notes. If durational is a Rest nothing will be added to the profile.
        Parameters:
        durational - durational object to be added to this profile.

      • add

        public void add(Chord chord)
        Add the notes in in the chord to this PCProfile.
        Parameters:
        chord - chord whose pitch classes are added to profile.

      • add

        public void add(Note note)
        Add to the pitch class bin of the pitch class of note. Uses the PCProfileWeighter of this PCProfile to calculate the value that is added to the pitch class bin.
        Parameters:
        note - the value is added to the bin corresponding to the pitch class of this note.

      • normalize

        public PCProfile normalize()
        Returns a normalized copy of this pitch profile. Normalizes profile so that largest value is 1.0
        Returns:
        normalized pitch class profile.

      • getValue

        public double getValue(PitchClass pc)
        Parameters:
        pc - pitch class for which to get the value.
        Returns:
        the value associated with PitchClass pc.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • correlation

        public static double correlation(PCProfile a,
                                 PCProfile b)
        Computes the correlation between the two profiles. Uses Pearson correlation coefficient formula for a sample. Normalizing the profiles does not affect correlation.
        Parameters:
        a - Profile for computing correlation.
        b - Profile for computing correlation.
        Returns:
        correlation between profiles a and b.

      • euclidean

        public static double euclidean(PCProfile a,
                               PCProfile b)
        Computes the Euclidean distance between profiles. Computes the Euclidean distance between the profiles which can be considered 12-dimensional vectors. The method normalize() can be used for getting the profiles to a similar range.
        Parameters:
        a - Profile for computing Euclidean distance.
        b - Profile for computing Euclidean distance.
        Returns:
        Euclidean distance between a and b.
